content:
TITLE: Curlie Command Syntax
DESCRIPTION: The general command syntax for using Curlie, showing the format with curl options, HTTP method, URL, and optional items.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
curlie [CURL_OPTIONS...] [METHOD] URL [ITEM [ITEM]]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Go
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using Go's package management system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
go install github.com/rs/curlie@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Homebrew
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using the Homebrew package manager for macOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
brew install curlie
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Eget on Ubuntu/Debian
DESCRIPTION: Commands to download and install Curlie using Eget on Ubuntu or Debian Linux distributions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
# Ubuntu/Debian
eget rs/curlie -a deb --to=curlie.deb
sudo dpkg -i curlie.deb
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Webi on macOS/Linux
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using the Webi installer on macOS or Linux systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
curl -sS https://webinstall.dev/curlie | bash
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Webi on Windows
DESCRIPTION: PowerShell command to install Curlie using the Webi installer on Windows systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: pwsh
CODE:
```
curl.exe -A "MS" https://webinstall.dev/curlie | powershell
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Curlie with Goreleaser for All Platforms
DESCRIPTION: Command to build Curlie using Goreleaser for all supported platforms, useful for testing cross-platform compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
goreleaser build --clean --snapshot
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Curlie with Goreleaser for Current Platform
DESCRIPTION: Command to build Curlie using Goreleaser only for the current platform, which is faster than building for all platforms.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
goreleaser build --clean --snapshot --single-target
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with Scoop
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using the Scoop package manager for Windows.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
scoop install curlie
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie with MacPorts
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using the MacPorts package manager on macOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
sudo port install curlie
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Curlie on FreeBSD with pkg
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Curlie using the pkg package manager on FreeBSD systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rs/curlie/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pkg install curlie
```
